-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Instances for the ToString class.
--   
--   This library provides the following instances for the ToString class:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>ByteString</li>
--   <li>Doc</li>
--   <li>Text</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   Note that the instances can be enabled or disabled based on cabal
--   flags.
--   
--   The idea is that eventually all packages providing string-like types
--   will provide instances for ToString themselves. In the mean time this
--   package is here to provide them.
@package to-string-instances
@version 0.2


-- | This module exports the following instances for the <a>ToString</a>
--   class:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><tt>ByteString</tt></li>
--   <li><tt>Doc</tt></li>
--   <li><tt>Text</tt></li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   Note that the instances can be enabled or disabled based on cabal
--   flags.
module Data.String.ToString.Instances
instance ToString Text
instance ToString Text
instance ToString Doc
instance ToString ByteString
